players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Stay cautious, as there might be another mafia member among us."
Bob: "I think Charlie is the mafioso. I am not sure about Alice."
